content: तल्पः --ल्पं [तल्-पक् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 28</ls>] {@--1@} A couch, bed, sofa; सपदि विगतनिद्रस्तल्पमुज्झांचकार <ls>R. 5. 75</ls> ‘left the bed’, ‘rose.’ {@--2@} (Fig.) A wife (as in गुरुतल्पग <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--3@} The seat of a carriage. {@--4@} An upper story, a turret, tower; <ls>R. 16. 11.</ls>

तल्पः --ल्पं [तल्-पक् <ls>Uṇ. 3. 28</ls>] {@--1@} A couch, bed, sofa; सपदि विगतनिद्रस्तल्पमुज्झांचकार <ls>R. 5. 75</ls> ‘left the bed’, ‘rose.’ {@--2@} (Fig.) A wife (as in गुरुतल्पग <ab>q. v.</ab>). {@--3@} The seat of a carriage. {@--4@} An upper story, a turret, tower; <ls>R. 16. 11.</ls>
